patchinfo.name: xorg-x11-driver-input
patchinfo.issue: Add an absolute Placement Mode for Touchscreens to the evdev-dr
patchinfo.description:
This update for xorg-x11-driver-input provides the following enhancements:
- Add Kiosk mode: Implement a filter for the evdev driver which provides click-on-touch and click-on-release. (fate#319647, bsc#967836)
